titles.title: I'm Going To Let The Lord Have His Way In My Life

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I'm going to let the Lord have His way in my life.
What have I got to lose and why should I strive?
He only wants to make me the highest any man could ever be.
Why should I be bound up when He only wants to set me free?

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
His ways are higher than mine
And a whole lot better
Than I could ever make them myself.
He's got everything I'm ever going to need my whole immortal life.
He fashioned me out of the dust of the earth
With His own two loving hands.
Why should I be upset when He wants to fit me into His plans?
